message: Knowledge of heaven and hell, Angels and watchers has been revealed in the bible. Though some have had glimpses of these realms within our realm, Jesus revealed he alone is the way the truth and the life, he made the way for us to enter this wonderful paradise by sacrificing his life to bring down the barrier of our fallen state and the judgement that was against us. In fact, we experience some of his gifts now in receiving communication from him, healings and deliverance.
